name: Bingus Quest
description: Bingus Quest Is an RPG where you look for the golden Bingus and meet friend along the way. The game is a rom made for the Gameboy and you can use MGBA or any Gameboy emulator. The game will never be pay only but instead optional donations. please comment on any bugs once the game is released. Also, the game is currently in early access and changes are already on the way so feel free to suggest changes.
